parameter.name: rentalStartTime
parameter.description: Vouchers will return the rental to start on specified date.

parameter.name: rentalEndTime
parameter.description: Vouchers will return the rental to end on specified date.

parameter.name: resourceId
parameter.description: Vouchers which can be used for this resource ID will be listed.

parameter.name: siteId
parameter.description: If site ID given but not resource ID provided, will list vouchers compatible with multiple resources.

parameter.name: voucherCodePrefix
parameter.description: Voucher code or just a voucher code prefix will be listed vouchers.

parameter.name: isCheckReservationTime
parameter.description: If true, only vouchers used for reservations entered at the time of making this call will be returned.
